roleset.name: (cause to) be along the periphery of
roleset.note: RIM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rim' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 47.8. (from rim.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: no agent
example.text: Right now he takes people out to fish in the bays behind the barrier islands that curve for hundreds of miles along the eastern coast of Texas, enclosing milky green lagoons behind ridges of sand and grassy scrub that [*T*-1] rim the deep blue of the Gulf beyond.
example.arg: that -> ridges of sand and grassy scrub
the deep blue of the Gulf beyond

example.name: with agent
example.text: Mary rimmed the fence around John's grave with motion detectors and spotlights--all aimed in.
example.arg: with motion detectors and spotlights--all aimed in
